<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Car Rental Reservation">2627b0af97428110002ffef3a253afdf</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:575a78a397828110002ffef3a253af80</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>onChange start weekend/business days</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

    var today = new Date();
	var start = new Date(g_form.getValue('start_datetime'));

	
	var startdatetime = start.getDay();



	if (startdatetime == 6 || startdatetime == 0) {
		g_form.showErrorBox('start_datetime','Start date should be reserve on business days');
		return false;

	}
   
}
  

]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nieltabar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-04 09:00:09</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5d5bfc9f976a0110002ffef3a253afd4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onChange start weekend/business days</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Car Rental Reservation" source="x_616811_car_renta">8025d70b974a0110002ffef3a253af0c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Car Rental Reservation">8025d70b974a0110002ffef3a253af0c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5d5bfc9f976a0110002ffef3a253afd4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nieltabar</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-04 09:00:09</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
